<<<<<<< HEAD
Mr. Chillingworths letter touching infallibility Chillingworth, William, 1602-1644.
xii p.
Printed by D. Maxwell for Timothy Garthwait, London : 1662.
Letter written "Good Mr. Leuger." Wing C3887B = Wing C3888. DFo copy of Wing C3887B, dated in imprint with same defective type '2' as Wing C3888. Imprimitur is dated: Sextil. 5. 1662. Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
Mr. Chillingworths letter touching infallibility Chillingworth, William, 1602-1644.
xii p.
Printed by D. Maxwell for Timothy Garthwait, London : 1662.
Letter written "Good Mr. Leuger." Wing C3887B = Wing C3888. DFo copy of Wing C3887B, dated in imprint with same defective type '2' as Wing C3888. Imprimitur is dated: Sextil. 5. 1662. Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Timothy Garthwait
D. Maxwell
